names.sv_subtypes: By variant type and SV subtype
names.sv_subtypes_sizes: By variant type and SV subtype and size

operation.name: Operation
operation.tooltip: Operation to perform on the pipeline

window_size.name: Window size
window_size.tooltip: Size range of the window used for the analysis

tp.name: TP
tp.tooltip: True Positives (variants present in the sample and correctly identified)

fn.name: FN
fn.tooltip: False Negatives (variants present in the sample and not identified)

fp.name: FP
fp.tooltip: False Positives (variants not actually present in the sample and incorrectly identified)

recall.name: Recall
recall.tooltip: Sensitivity or True Positive rate. Recall = TP / (TP + FN)
recall.legend: Recall is calculated exclusively using the true positives and false negatives from the recall samples.

precision.name: Precision
precision.legend: Precision is calculated exclusively using the true positives and false positives from the precision samples.

f1_score.name: F1 score
f1_score.legend: F1-score is calculated using the precision and recall values from the precision and recall samples respectively.

protein_affected_genes_count.name: Prot. genes
protein_affected_genes_count.tooltip: Genes whose proteins are affected by discovered variants (only TP)
protein_affected_genes_count.legend: Warning: ONCOLINER does not compute genes linked to false positives.

protein_affected_driver_genes_count.name: Cancer driver prot. genes
protein_affected_driver_genes_count.tooltip: Cancer driver genes whose proteins are affected by discovered variants (only TP)
protein_affected_driver_genes_count.legend: Warning: ONCOLINER does not compute genes linked to false positives.

added_callers.name: Added callers
added_callers.tooltip: Number of callers added to the pipeline
